title: Make Du‘a for the Blessed
description: Today, make a heartfelt du‘a for someone who has what you desire. Ask Allah to bless them more.

title: Gratitude Over Comparison – 3 Days
description: Each day, list 3 things you have that you would never trade. Say Alhamdulillah sincerely.

title: 7-Day Envy Cleanse
description: For one week, replace every jealous thought with a praise of Allah or positive prayer.

title: Recall Your Origin
description: Today, reflect on your creation and ultimate return. Remember your place before Allah.

title: Serve Someone Silently – 3 Days
description: Do something humble and unnoticed each day. Let it break your ego softly.

title: 7 Days of Sincere Equality
description: For 7 days, treat everyone as better than yourself — inwardly and outwardly.

title: Let One Grudge Go
description: Think of someone who hurt you. Say ‘I forgive them’ for Allah’s sake, even silently.

title: Du‘a for the Difficult One – 3 Days
description: Each day, make a short du‘a for someone you dislike or avoid. Ask for their good.

title: 7-Day Grudge Cleanse
description: Let go of resentment. For a week, avoid rethinking past pain. Forgive. Move forward.

title: Call or Check on One Person
description: Today, reach out to someone who may be lonely, sick, or struggling.

title: 3-Day Mercy Lens
description: For 3 days, try to see everyone through the lens of mercy. Assume they’re fighting battles.

title: 7-Day Compassion Practice
description: Actively help or show empathy to someone new each day. Journal what you felt.

title: Hide a Good Deed
description: Today, do something purely for Allah that no one knows about. Keep it secret.

title: Du‘a Before Deeds – 3 Days
description: Make intention and du‘a for sincerity before each act of worship for 3 days.

title: 7 Days of Purified Intention
description: Say ‘This is for You, O Allah’ before every public or visible action for one week.

title: Read One Ayah of Mercy
description: Today, read and reflect on an ayah that promises Allah’s forgiveness. Let it enter your heart.

title: Du‘a of Hope – 3 Days
description: Each day, say: ‘Ya Allah, I believe You love to forgive, so forgive me.’ Say it with hope.

title: 7 Days of Hope Practice
description: Reject despair for one week. Anytime doubt arises, counter it with a promise of Allah.

title: Reflect on Death
description: Take 2 minutes today to imagine your grave and your meeting with Allah.

title: 3-Day Akhirah Focus
description: Each day, read one ayah or hadith about the Hereafter and reflect deeply.

title: 7-Day Death Awareness Practice
description: For one week, remind yourself of the Hereafter before each major decision.
